title: Hedgehog learns to love
description:
这一年里我成长了很多，回头看只是感慨我真的打碎了二十几年的我，重新建立了一个新的我。

四月我来到了一个社区，在那里认识了一群人，我们抱着「都不想在世俗中枯萎」的念头相遇，在这个过程中讶异于我们的同频，这里有一群人可以陪你做你所有想要做的事，我对他们说起了那个真实的我以及我此生的理想主义。

我在这里重拾了失去已久的爱与被爱的能力。当我这么和依然说的时候，她问我：「你觉得你的爱别人是什么？」

我想是不再吝啬自己的时间在他人身上，做多人份的早餐，陪着你们去许多地方、做许多事。

我想是我愿意主动制造羁绊。

—

I have grown a lot this year. Looking back, I realize I truly shattered the me I had been for over twenty years, and rebuilt a new self.

In April, I joined a community and met a group of people there. We came together with a shared sentiment: None of us want to wither in the mundane world. I was surprised by how much we resonated with each other. Here was a group of people willing to accompany you in everything you wanted to do. I told them about the real me — and my lifelong idealism.

Here, I regained my long-lost ability to love and be loved. When I shared this with Yiran, she asked me: What do you think your love for others is?

I think it is no longer being stingy with my time for others — making breakfast for many, accompanying you to many places, doing many things together.

I think it is being willing to take the initiative to create bonds.
